entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution fails if user has group with brackets in name #55255
  • gRPC JSON transcoding google.protobuf.WellKnownTypes response/request cast error #55254
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55250
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicgrpcpublishaot #55249
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55248
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55247
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55246
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55245
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55244
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55243
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55242
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55241
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55240
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55239
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55238
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55237
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55236
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55235
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55234
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #55233
  • Resumable State Machine for Blazor #55232

Closed

  • Directly referencing the staticwebassets of QuickGrid results in compilation error #55009
  • npm ERR! request to https://registry.npmjs.org/@microsoft%2fsignalr failed, reason: unable to verify the first certificate #55203

PullRequests

Created

  • HybridCache - minor post-PR fixes #55251
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching

Updated

  • Fix duplicate error.type tags #55211
    area-hosting
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
